sections.body: Assign anchors: **YOU/SELF** (center), **FRIEND** (left), **COACH/TEACHER** (right), **PLACE** (up-right). Keep RS brief, then return to narrator.

callouts.title: Pause Cues
callouts.body: Tiny pause after **TIME** and after **FINISH** improves readability.

sections.body: Include at least **2 Unit 4 topics**, **PAST/NEXT/FUTURE**, **1 FINISH**, **1 RS**, and **1 question** (WH or Y/N). Keep clauses compact.

sections.body: Swap videos; give **one praise + one cue** (e.g., **GOOD! FINISH CLEAR. TRY RS SHORTER.**).
